page.title: 08HOME LIFE
page.content: FAMILIES IN OUR AREA SEEM TO BE VERY CLOSELY KNIT.WHEN PEOPLE MARRY THEY USUALLY LIVE NEAR TO THEIR PLACE OF WORK AND THIS TENDS TO BE WHERE ONE HALF OF THE FAMILY WAS LIVING BEFORE MARRIAGE. THIS HAS RESULTED IN CLOSE FAMILY COMMUNITIES. GRANDPARENTS PLAY A VERY IMPORTANT PART IN FAMILY LIFE- THEY OFTEN HELP WITH THE UPBRINGING OF THE FAMILIES ESPECIALLY BY GIVING ADVICE,COOKING AND BABYSITTING. WEEKENDS ARE A SPECIAL PART OF OUR FAMILY LIFE AS THIS IS THE TIME WHEN THE FAMILY CAN GET TOGETHER TO RELAX AND ENJOY EACH OTHERS COMPANY. 88% HAVE GRANDPARENTS LIVING WITHIN WALKING DISTANCE. 68% HAVE 2 OR MORE UNCLES/AUNTS LIVING WITHIN WALKING DISTANCE. 12% HAVE GRANDPARENTS LIVING WITH THEM 8% OF MOTHERS WORK FULL TIME.
